name: GoBackModi
description:
This is a fun representation of true events which happened to Indian PM Modi when he visited the state of TamilNadu. As the Tamil Nadu farmers plights were not fulfilled  even after the country's Supreme Court ordered it people  of TamilNadu planned to protest by showing black flags . But when Modi tried to avoid that by flying in helicopter people flew black baloons.

How to Play the game, Touch top of the screen to go up, Bottom to go down. Dont hit the baloons. Run
